name: Stacking DAO Stacked Stacks BTC
description: We make staking on Stacks easy through liquid staking. This is a token listing for Stacking DAO's second liquid staking token (LST), stacked STX BTC, which generates yield in sBTC. Users can stack STX through our protocol (similar to Lido) and earn network rewards (sBTC). Stacking DAO has over $70M in TVL with over $3.5M in rewards generated. We have over 40,000 users who have used our LST on Stacks to hold in their wallets or deploy in DeFi.
